name: Classic Leather Jacket
description: Crafted from premium full-grain leather, this iconic jacket blends timeless moto-inspired style with modern tailoring. Features a slim silhouette, antique brass hardware, and luxuriously soft quilted lining. A wardrobe investment that only gets better with age.
details: 100% full-grain cowhide leather. YKK zipper closure. Interior pocket. Quilted polyester lining. Imported.
careInstructions: Professional leather clean only. Store on a padded hanger. Avoid prolonged exposure to direct sunlight.

name: Premium Runner Sneakers
description: Engineered for all-day comfort without sacrificing style. These premium runners feature responsive cushioning, breathable mesh upper, and a retro-inspired silhouette that pairs effortlessly with everything from joggers to tailored trousers.
details: Mesh and synthetic upper. EVA midsole. Rubber outsole. Cushioned insole. Imported.
careInstructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Air dry away from direct heat. Remove insoles to air out after wear.

name: Essential Cotton Tee
description: The foundation of every great outfit. Cut from heavyweight 220gsm organic cotton with a relaxed fit that drapes beautifully. Pre-washed for zero shrinkage and a lived-in softness from day one.
details: 100% organic cotton, 220gsm. Crew neck. Relaxed fit. Pre-washed. Made in Portugal.
careInstructions: Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach. Iron on low heat if needed.

name: Urban Streetwear Hoodie
description: Our signature oversized hoodie redefines casual luxury. Made from a custom brushed-fleece blend that feels impossibly soft inside, with dropped shoulders, a generous hood, and a kangaroo pocket sized for your essentials.
details: 80% cotton, 20% polyester. 340gsm brushed fleece interior. Oversized fit. Ribbed cuffs and hem. Drawcord hood.
careInstructions: Machine wash cold inside out. Tumble dry low. Do not iron print areas.

name: Artisan Leather Tote
description: A modern take on the classic tote, handcrafted from vegetable-tanned Italian leather that develops a beautiful patina over time. Unlined interior with a secure magnetic closure, interior zip pocket, and hand-stitched handles reinforced for daily carry.
details: Vegetable-tanned Italian leather. Unlined. Magnetic snap closure. Interior zip pocket. Hand-stitched handles. W: 38cm × H: 35cm × D: 12cm.
careInstructions: Condition with leather balm every 3–6 months. Avoid water exposure. Store stuffed with tissue paper.

name: Minimalist Chronograph
description: A refined timepiece that strips away everything unnecessary. Swiss quartz movement housed in a 40mm brushed steel case, paired with a supple Italian leather strap. Sapphire crystal glass and 50m water resistance make it ready for real life.
details: Swiss quartz movement. 316L stainless steel case, 40mm. Sapphire crystal. Italian leather strap. 50m water resistant.
careInstructions: Wipe case with a soft cloth. Avoid contact with chemicals or perfume. Replace battery every 2 years.

name: Aviator Polarized Sunglasses
description: Iconic aviator silhouette updated with lightweight titanium frames and premium polarized lenses that cut glare without distorting color. Flexible temple tips and adjustable nose pads ensure a secure, comfortable fit all day long.
details: Titanium frame. Polarized CR-39 lenses. UV400 protection. Adjustable nose pads. Includes hard case and microfiber cloth.
careInstructions: Clean lenses with included microfiber cloth. Store in hard case when not in use. Do not leave in hot car.

name: Silk Slip Dress
description: Effortless elegance in pure mulberry silk. This bias-cut slip dress skims the body with a fluid, flattering drape. Adjustable spaghetti straps and a subtle cowl neckline keep it refined. Layer it or let it stand alone — it works either way.
details: 100% mulberry silk. Bias cut. Adjustable straps. Cowl neckline. Midi length. Dry clean recommended.
careInstructions: Dry clean recommended. If hand washing, use cold water and silk detergent. Lay flat to dry. Iron on silk setting.

name: Tailored Chino Pants
description: Precision-tailored chinos that bridge the gap between casual and dressy. Cut from a structured Japanese cotton twill with just enough stretch for all-day comfort. Flat front, tapered leg, and a clean coin pocket detail.
details: 98% Japanese cotton, 2% elastane. Twill weave. Flat front. Tapered leg. 4 pockets. Button fly. Imported.
careInstructions: Machine wash cold. Hang dry or tumble dry low. Warm iron for a crisp finish.

name: White Minimal Sneakers
description: The cleanest sneakers you will ever own. Built on a slim Italian-made sole with a buttery nappa leather upper and tonal stitching. No logos, no flash — just impeccable craft and quiet confidence.
details: Full-grain nappa leather upper. Italian-made margom rubber sole. Cushioned insole. Tonal stitching. Imported from Italy.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Use a leather protector spray. Store with shoe trees to maintain shape.

name: Cashmere Blend Crew Sweater
description: Indulgent softness meets everyday wearability. Knitted from a fine-gauge cashmere and merino wool blend, this crew neck sweater has a medium weight perfect for layering. Ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem add subtle structure.
details: 70% merino wool, 30% cashmere. Fine gauge knit. Crew neck. Ribbed trims. Regular fit. Dry clean or hand wash.
careInstructions: Hand wash cold in wool detergent. Reshape and lay flat to dry. Do not wring or tumble dry. Fold to store, do not hang.

name: Structured Wool Overcoat
description: Command any room in this impeccably structured overcoat. Double-faced Italian wool with a single-breasted closure, notch lapel, and a mid-thigh length that works with everything from suits to sneakers. Fully lined with interior pockets.
details: 100% double-faced Italian wool. Single-breasted, 3-button. Notch lapel. Fully lined. Two exterior flap pockets. Interior welt pocket.
careInstructions: Dry clean only. Store on a wide, padded hanger. Brush with a garment brush after each wear.

name: Relaxed Linen Shirt
description: Pure European linen washed to a beautiful softness. This relaxed-fit button-down features a camp collar, chest pocket, and a slightly longer back hem for effortless untucked wear. The ultimate warm-weather essential.
details: 100% European linen. Camp collar. Single chest pocket. Mother-of-pearl buttons. Relaxed fit. Pre-washed.
careInstructions: Machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Hang dry. Embrace the natural wrinkle — it is part of linen's charm.

name: Selvedge Denim Jeans
description: Japanese selvedge denim built to last a lifetime. These straight-fit jeans are crafted from raw 14oz denim woven on vintage shuttle looms. They will mold to your body and develop unique fading patterns that tell your story.
details: 100% Japanese selvedge cotton denim. 14oz raw denim. Straight fit. 5-pocket construction. Button fly. Chain-stitched hem.
careInstructions: Wash as infrequently as possible. When needed, wash cold inside out. Hang dry. Do not bleach or tumble dry.

name: Canvas Weekender Bag
description: Go anywhere with this rugged yet refined weekender. Waxed organic canvas body with full-grain leather handles and trim. A spacious main compartment fits everything for a long weekend, plus a dedicated shoe pocket keeps things organized.
details: Waxed organic canvas. Full-grain leather handles and trim. Brass hardware. Interior zip pocket. Shoe compartment. Detachable shoulder strap. L: 55cm × H: 32cm × D: 25cm.
careInstructions: Spot clean with a damp cloth. Re-wax canvas annually for water resistance. Condition leather trim with balm.
